QuestData.Title: Deeproot
QuestData.Description: Since yer all set up to take on trees and bushes now, I need ta ask for a favor.$b$bI came to Gorgrond in search of an expedition of me fellow Dark Irons that were headed this way. Sadly I lost 'em.$b$bI am goin' south to look for them. Thing is, south is nothing but botani, podlings, giant trees, and other mean, angry plants.$b$bYer lumber camp resources would be mighty appreciated. If ya help me look for me friends I swear we'll help ya in any way we can.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah good! Ya made it.$b$bThe lasses here insisted on comin' with, though they don't seem to like each other much.
